Text: work fine..don't need to copy the stupid commercial url address.at the end of the angry birds download copy the serial in notepad.then register the game..

You're correct panda1264 you don't need to copy the stupid commercial url address....but to those who do, it is much appreciated.

Thanks
I saw no serial txt file after download, just the readme...

Should have made this clearer.... When you install the game, there is a box that pops up asking if you want to view the Serial. Say 'YES' to this, and the .txt file appears with the serial code.

Remember to NOT be connected to internet at that point.

funciona como um encanto obrigado homem por este grande uploader 


gracias a >>>>>mastid

Now we talking. Working perfect. All 4 games. Thanks to mastid. 
P.S.: When you installing leave internet connection on. After installation disable internet and then enter the code for full activation.
Thanks uploader. All 4 games are working perfectly.
